-dead hard key responsibility (every key to slow such as press E for dead hard you have to press E for 10 years to make dead hard working)

Great game to play with friends.

Great game, even with its many bugs, i mean features. After dedicated servers came in, i couldnt believe how much id prefer every 5th killer lag switching my ass over this crap we see now. Brutal hitboxes, BS hits, and killers can still fuck with people by vpning and causing lag which doesnt hurt them as much as it hurts the survivors. So it changed nothing except after months of being downed by a killer 3 miles away from me, i uninstalled the game. Since then, in the past year or so, its gotten even more popular. I have decided to reinstall to camp survivors (even though i dont need to, survivors, especially console, are mostly terrible). And maybe play survivor and sandbag. :P. 

If you are going to play, be on PC, or at least a modern console to handle the game since its graphical updates. And survivors, stop pussing out and do gens. Urbanning in a corner with your self care and spine chill isnt upping your game.
would be fun with friends if they could run it

Great game, lots to learn and progress in. Yes there are bugs during patches but the heart of the game is fantastic. You can spend tons of time focusing on becoming a great survivor and then essentially experience a whole new game playing killer. 10/10 I keep coming back!

You will not have fun in this game. You will endlessly suffer through many, many hours. Even if you are good, you will not have fun. Killer is unfun. Survivor is unfun. You will run into bad teammates, and worse killers. This game is entirely survivor sided. You will be disconnected. You will get mad. You will realize how imbalanced this game is.

Pretty good, not gonna lie.
So much fun, very mind based game. Would recommend 10/10.
